pkgmetadata.longdescription: The lsvpd package contains all of the lsvpd, lscfg and lsmcode commands. These commands, along with a scanning program called vpdupdate, constitute a hardware inventory system. The lsvpd command provides Vital Product Data (VPD) about hardware components to higher-level serviceability tools. The lscfg command provides a more human-readable format of the VPD, as well as some system-specific information. lsmcode lists microcode and firmware levels. lsvio lists virtual devices.
